title: The Little Prince (Simplified)
description: A simple version of the classic tale for beginners.

content.text: Once when I was six years old I saw a magnificent picture in a book. The book was called True Stories from Nature. It was about the primeval forest.
It was a picture of a boa constrictor in the act of swallowing an animal. A boa constrictor is a big snake. It can swallow animals whole.
In the book it said: Boa constrictors swallow their prey whole without chewing it. After that they are not able to move. They sleep during the six months that they need for digestion.
I thought a lot about the adventures of the jungle. Then I made my first drawing. I showed my masterpiece to the grown-ups and asked them whether the drawing frightened them.
But they answered: Why should anyone be frightened by a hat? My drawing was not a picture of a hat. It was a picture of a boa constrictor digesting an elephant.
The grown-ups did not understand. I had to explain everything to them. That is always the problem with grown-ups.
So I lived my life alone, without anyone that I could really talk to. I became a pilot. I flew airplanes all over the world.
Geography has been very useful to me. I could recognize China from Arizona at first glance. It is very useful if one gets lost in the night.
Six years ago I had an accident with my plane in the Desert of Sahara. Something was broken in my engine. I did not have a mechanic or any passengers with me.
I was all alone. I had to do the repair work myself. It was a question of life or death for me. I had only enough drinking water for eight days.
The first night I went to sleep on the sand. I was a thousand miles from any human habitation. I was more isolated than a shipwrecked sailor on a raft in the middle of the ocean.
You can imagine my surprise when I was awakened by a strange little voice. It said: Please draw me a sheep!
I jumped to my feet as if I had been struck by lightning. I looked around. And I saw a most extraordinary small person. He was standing there looking at me.
Here you can see the best portrait that I was able to make of him later. But my drawing is not as beautiful as the model. That is not my fault.
The little fellow looked at me very seriously. He said again: Please draw me a sheep. I did not understand. I was too surprised.
I told him that I do not know how to draw. He said: That does not matter. Draw me a sheep. So I drew.
He looked at my drawing carefully. Then he said: No, this sheep is already very sick. Please make me another.
I drew again. My friend smiled gently. He said: You can see for yourself. This is not a sheep. It is a ram. It has horns.
I made another drawing. But it was rejected too. He said: This one is too old. I want a sheep that will live a long time.
I was losing my patience. I needed to start work on my engine. So I made this drawing. I said: This is only his box. The sheep you asked for is inside.
To my surprise, the little prince was delighted. He said: That is exactly the way I wanted it! Do you think that this sheep will need a lot of grass?
I said: Why? He replied: Because where I live everything is very small. He bent his head over the drawing. He said: Not so small that... Look! He has gone to sleep.
That is how I made the acquaintance of the little prince. He came from a very small planet. It was only a little bigger than he was.
I learned where he came from. His planet was called Asteroid B-612. I learned this important information only because of a Turkish astronomer.
